Definition: In this task, you will be given an English sentence. Your task is to classify the sentence as either a 'good' representation of an adjunct island, or a 'bad' representation. A 'good' representation of an adjunct island is a grammatically correct sentence that uses an adjunct island. An incorrect representation is anything else.
